attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that sitting prime ministers nor cabinet ministers cannot expend taxpayer pounds on party political matters such as the appointment of political activists employed only to further the party political aspirations of the sitting prime minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is reported to be appointing people to hugely salaried jobs without any cognizance to a budget or the cost to the taxpayer.  The man is obviously out of control reacting badly to criticism from his colleagues and political adversaries within his own party and needs to be reined back.  Paying political activists out of public funds should be illegal.  If he wants to employ people to bolster him and tell him how good he is and how well he is doing then they should be paid out of party funds and NOT by the taxpayer.
